UmbracoDefinition.description: Configuration container for all Umbraco products.

FormDesignSettings.description: Defines configuration settings related to form design.

Defaults.description: Gets or sets the default form settings.

DisableAutomaticAdditionOfDataConsentFie.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data consent field should be automatically added to new forms.

DisableDefaultWorkflow.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the default workflow should be disabled for new forms.

MaxNumberOfColumnsInFormGroup.description: Gets or set the maximum number of columns that can be added to a form group.

DefaultTheme.description: Gets or sets the default theme to use when rendering forms where the editor hasn't selected a theme.

DefaultEmailTemplate.description: Gets or sets a relative path, within Views/Partials, to the default email template used in Razor email workflows.

RemoveProvidedEmailTemplate.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the out of the box email template should be hidden from selection.

RemoveProvidedFormTemplates.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the out of the box forms templates should be hidden from selection.

FormElementHtmlIdPrefix.description: Gets or sets a value used to prefix the page, fieldset and field Id values used when rendering the form HTML Id attributes.

SettingsCustomization.description: Gets or sets a set of values for customization of field and workflow settings.

ManualApproval.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form requires manual approval.

DisableStylesheet.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form requires manual approval.

MarkFieldsIndicator.description: Gets or sets the form field indication behaviour.

Indicator.description: Gets or sets the default form field indicator.

RequiredErrorMessage.description: Gets or sets the default error message for a missing but required form field entry.

InvalidErrorMessage.description: Gets or sets the default error message for an invalid form field entry.

ShowValidationSummary.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the validation summary should be shown.

HideFieldValidationLabels.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether field validation labels should be hidden.

NextPageButtonLabel.description: Gets or sets the default next page button label for multi-step forms.

PreviousPageButtonLabel.description: Gets or sets the default previous page button label for multi-step forms.

SubmitButtonLabel.description: Gets or sets the default submit button label.

MessageOnSubmit.description: Gets or sets the default message shown to the user on submission.

MessageOnSubmitIsHtml.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form's message to display on submission is in HTML format.

StoreRecordsLocally.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether form submissions (records) should be stored in the local database.

AutocompleteAttribute.description: Gets or sets a value for the default autocomplete attribute applied to rendered forms.

DaysToRetainSubmittedRecordsFor.description: Gets or sets a value for the number of days to retain submitted records.

DaysToRetainApprovedRecordsFor.description: Gets or sets a value for the number of days to retain approved records.

DaysToRetainRejectedRecordsFor.description: Gets or sets a value for the number of days to retain rejected records.

ProviderSettingsCustomization.description: Defines configuration settings for the customization of field or workflow settings.

PackageOptionSettings.description:
This is the default option from Forms 12.

Defines settings for package runtime options.

IgnoreWorkFlowsOnEdit.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether workflows should be ignored on edit.

AllowEditableFormSubmissions.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether form submission can be edited.

AppendQueryStringOnRedirectAfterFormSubm.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to append a querystring on redirect after form submission.

CultureToUseWhenParsingDatesForBackOffic.description:
Gets or sets a value useful for or setups that have a single front-end website culture but potentially different
back-office cultures for editors.
This setting can be used to force parsing of persisted date values with the culture used to store them, for display
in the back-office.

TriggerConditionsCheckOn.description:
Gets or sets a value that allows control over the client-side event used to trigger conditional checks.
Valid values are "change" (the default) or "input".

ScheduledRecordDeletion.description: Gets or sets settings related to the data deletion service.

DisableRecordIndexing.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether form submissions (records) will be indexed by Examine.

EnableFormsApi.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Forms headless/AJAX API endpoints are available.

EnableRecordingOfIpWithFormSubmission.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to record the IP address of the user submitting the form.

DisableClientSideValidationDependencyChe.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable the client side validation framework dependency check.

ScheduledRecordDeletionSettings.description: Defines settings relating to automatic data deletion.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data deletion is enabled.

FirstRunTime.description: Gets or sets a value for the first run time of the data deletion service.

Period.description: Gets or sets a value for the period of the data deletion operations.

DisallowedFileUploadExtensions.description: Gets or sets a value listing the file extensions that are disallowed from upload for all forms.

EnableAntiForgeryToken.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether anti-forgery tokens should be used on forms.

SavePlainTextPasswords.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether saving plain text passwords is allowed.

DisableFileUploadAccessProtection.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the protection for access of file uploads is disabled

ManageSecurityWithUserGroups.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the permissions are managed at the group level.

GrantAccessToNewFormsForUserGroups.description:
Gets or sets a comma seperated list of user group aliases that will be granted access automatically to new forms, when
ManageSecurityWithUserGroups is set to true.

DefaultUserAccessToNewForms.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users are automatically granted access to newly created forms.

FormsApiKey.description: Gets or sets the API key configured for authorization of server-to-server Forms API requests.

EnableAntiForgeryTokenForFormsApi.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether anti-forgery tokens should be used on form submissions carried out via the headless/AJAX API.

DatePickerSettings.description: Defines security settings relating to the date picker field type.

DatePickerYearRange.description: Gets or sets the range of years to allow selection from.

Recaptcha2Settings.description: Defines security settings relating to the Recaptcha2 field type.

PublicKey.description: Gets or sets the public key.

PrivateKey.description: Gets or sets the private key.

Recaptcha3Settings.description: Defines security settings relating to the Recaptcha3 field type.

SiteKey.description: Gets or sets the site key.

PrivateKey.description: Gets or sets the private key.

Domain.description: Gets or sets the domain to use for retrieving the reCAPTCHA assets.

RecaptchaDomain.description: Defines options for the domain used for requesting client-side assets and the host for the reCAPTCHA cookie domain.

RichTextSettings.description: Defines security settings relating to the rich text field type.

DataTypeId.description: Gets or sets the rich text data type Id.
